frontmatter.title: pltr
frontmatter.lede: Browser extension which tells you the progress of the page as you scroll through it

frontmatter.title: Color Composer
frontmatter.lede: An interactive installation for the Nelson Atkins Museum of Art.

frontmatter.title: Carmen
frontmatter.lede: A Chatbot that helps Barkley partners find their way.

frontmatter.lede: An Arduino-powered vending machine that dispenses Mapkins for a text.

frontmatter.lede: A Twitterbot that shows if one of Barkley's Zen Rooms is available.

frontmatter.title: Roshambot
frontmatter.lede: An artificially intelligent disembodied hand that plays rock-paper-scissors.

frontmatter.title: Foodoh
frontmatter.lede: A food recommender system which takes in food preference of user and recommends the best restaurant nearby.
